summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Beacon Avenue, from Columbian Way to Myrtle Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14330 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
